This is an example of post with some code.

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

t = np.arange(0, 1, 0.01)
x = np.sin(2*np.pi*t*3)

plt.plot(t, x)
plt.show()
```
